newsitem.title: COLOMBIA: Colombian police report huge cocaine haul.
newsitem.headline: Colombian police report huge cocaine haul.

text.p: Police seized 2,310 pounds (1,050 kg) of cocaine in a raid early on Saturday on a clandestine drug laboratory in Colombia's northwestern province of Antioquia, authorities said.
Police spokesmen said the sprawling laboratory, in a remote, jungle-covered area, had a capacity to produce 10 metric tons of cocaine a week and faclities to house about 150 workers.
No arrests were reported in the raid, in which police destroyed vast quantities of precursor chemicals and burned the drug processing plant to the ground.
